snippet: The complaint accused the company of using improper methods to inflate what it charged to service Navy ships across much of the globe.
abstract: Justice Dept announces it is joining civil whistle-blower fraud lawsuit against Dubai-owned Inchcape Shipping Services; company is accused of overcharging United States Navy by tens of millions of dollars.

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER DREW and DANIELLE IVORY

lead_paragraph: The complaint accused the company of using improper methods to inflate what it charged to service Navy ships across much of the globe.

headline.main: U.S. to Sue Contractor It Says Bilked the Navy
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Sue Contractor It Says Bilked the Navy

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
